item.title: This JACS does not exist
item.author: Yue Wu
item.description: An imaginary abstract generated at ThisJACSdoesnotexist.com In academic chemistry, authors submit a promotional table-of-contents (ToC) image when publishing research papers in most journals. These fascinate me as they are one of the few places where unfettered self expression is tolerated, if not condoned. (See e.g. TOC ROFL, of which I am a multiple inductee) In general, though, ToC images follow a fairly consistent visual language, with distinct conventions followed in different subfields.
